title: Smoked fish and corn tart
ingredients: ['Shortcrust pastry', '175g plain flour', 'pinch of salt', '85g cool butter, diced', 'Fish Filling', '225g smoked haddock', '1 bay leaf', '3 black peppercorns', '100ml semi-skimmed milk', '3 eggs, lightly beaten', '150ml single cream', '2 tsp wholegrain mustard', 'pinch of freshly grated nutmeg', '1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley', '150g sweetcorn, thawed if bought frozen']
